price: Give relatives their due, and the needy and the stranded travelers, and do not spend wastefully.
arabic: وَءَاتِ ذَا ٱلۡقُرۡبَىٰ حَقَّهُۥ وَٱلۡمِسۡكِينَ وَٱبۡنَ ٱلسَّبِيلِ وَلَا تُبَذِّرۡ تَبۡذِيرًا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
